scripts.css-build-web: node-sass --output-style compressed web/css/theme-dark.scss > web/css/theme-dark.css && node-sass --output-style compressed web/css/theme-light.scss > web/css/theme-light.css
scripts.build-win-exe-only: dotnet clean app\pgcode.csproj && dotnet publish -r win10-x64 -c Release /p:PublishSingleFile=true /p:PublishTrimmed=true -o __exe\win10-x64 --nologo app\pgcode.csproj
